refnamediv.refpurpose: Return a list of allowed Lua globals

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public arrayLuaSandbox::allowedGlobals
Returns a list of allowed Lua global variables as a numbered array.
For more information about filtering allowed globals, see luasandbox.allowed_globals.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns a numbered array of the names of allowed Lua global variables, which may be empty.
